text.title: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac

head.s: Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac

p.s: This wikiHow teaches you how to take notes and highlight sections on a PDF text document , using your computer 's stock PDF reader app .
You can use Preview on Mac , and Reader on Windows .

head.s: Adding Notes to a PDF on Mac

item.s: Open your PDF document in Preview .
Double-click the PDF document to open it in Mac 's default PDF reader , Preview .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 1.jpg

item.s: Press on your keyboard .
This will show Preview 's markup toolbar at the top of your document .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 2.jpg

item.s: Alternatively , you can click the toolbox icon in the upper-right corner of Preview , next to the search bar .
Click the notepad icon on the markup toolbar .
This button looks like a square with horizontal lines in it .
You can find it next to the signature icon at the top .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 3.jpg

item.s: This will create a new , yellow notepad sheet .
It looks like a yellow square on your PDF .
Click the yellow square to type .
If the yellow notepad square does n't automatically prompt you to write , click on it again to expand your note sheet .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 4.jpg

item.s: Type your note into the yellow notepad .
Anything you write here will be saved in your note .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 5.jpg

item.s: Click anywhere on your PDF .
This will minimize the pop-up notepad into a yellow square with no text .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 6.jpg

item.s: Drag the yellow square anywhere on the PDF .
You can place your note anywhere on your document .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 7.jpg

item.s: Click the yellow square to view your note .
Clicking will expand the notepad sheet .
You can view and edit your note here anytime .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 8.jpg

item.s: Click the icon on the markup toolbar .
You can find this button on the markup toolbar near the upper-left corner .
It will add a textbox in the middle of your PDF .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 9.jpg

item.s: Hold and drag the textbox anywhere on your PDF .
You can place the box anywhere on the margins or over the text .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 10.jpg

item.s: Double-click on the textbox .
This will allow you to edit the text in it .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 11.jpg

item.s: The placeholder text reads " Text " in the text box .
Type your notes in the textbox .
You can use your keyboard to enter your comments or questions here .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 12.jpg

item.s: Click the icon on the markup toolbar .
This button is on the far-right end of the markup toolbar at the top .
You can edit your text 's font , size , and style here .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 13.jpg

item.s: Select a font from the drop-down .
Enter a number in the " pt " field to change text size .
Click the color box to select a text color .

Use the
B
,
I
, U icons for bold , italics , and underline .
Select a text alignment at the bottom .
Open your PDF document in Preview .
Double-click the PDF document to open it in Mac 's default PDF reader , Preview .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 14.jpg

item.s: Press on your keyboard .
This will show Preview 's markup toolbar at the top of your document .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 15.jpg

item.s: Alternatively , you can click the toolbox icon in the upper-right corner of Preview , next to the search bar .
Click the pencil icon on the top-right .

This is the
Sketch
tool .
You can find it next to the dashed square icon on the markup toolbar at the top .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 16.jpg

item.s: Sketch a line or curve on your PDF .
You can use this to mark or cross certain sections in the text .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 17.jpg

item.s: If Preview is not sure about your sketch , you 'll see a pop-up box in the upper-left corner below the markup toolbar .
You can select what you meant to draw here .
Click the three-lines icon on the markup toolbar .
It 's located next to the notepad icon at the top .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 18.jpg

item.s: Select a line thickness .
The thickness style you select here will automatically apply to your current sketch .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 19.jpg

item.s: You can also click a line to select it , then change its thickness here later .
Click the color square icon next to the three-lines button .
You can select a color for your sketch lines and curves here .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 20.jpg

item.s: Click the pen icon next to the pencil on the markup toolbar .

This is the
Draw
tool .
You can use this tool to draw and sketch free-hand on your PDF .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 21.jpg

item.s: You can select a thickness and color from the markup toolbar .
Draw freely with your cursor on the PDF .
You can use the Draw tool to mark or cross something in the text or take notes anywhere on the page .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 22.jpg

head.s: Adding Notes and Highlighting on Windows

item.s: Open your PDF document in Windows Reader .
Double-click the PDF document to open it in Windows 's default PDF reader app , Reader .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 23.jpg

item.s:
If you have another reader app set as your default , right-click your PDF document , hover over
Open with
, and select
Reader
here .
Select a word , sentence , line or paragraph in your PDF .
Hold down your left mouse button , and select where you want to add your note .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 24.jpg

item.s: This will highlight your selection , and show your options in a pop-up toolbox .

You can select
Highlight
,
Add a note
, or
Copy
here .
Click in the pop-up toolbox .
This option looks like a speech balloon icon .
It will create a small note sheet on your PDF .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 25.jpg

item.s: Type your note into the small note sheet .
Anything you write here will be saved in your note .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 26.jpg

item.s: Click anywhere on the PDF .
This will close the pop-up notepad , and save your note .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 27.jpg

item.s: Click the highlighted section on your PDF .
Your options will pop up on a toolbar .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 28.jpg

item.s: Click on the pop-up toolbar .
This will open your saved note .
You can view and edit your note here anytime .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 29.jpg

item.s: Select any text in your PDF .
You can select any word , sentence , line or paragraph with your left mouse button .
This will show your markup options in a pop-up toolbox .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 30.jpg

item.s: Click in the pop-up toolbox .
This will highlight your selection in the text .
You can easily find this section next time you open your document .

figure.rend: Make Notes on a PDF on PC or Mac Step 31.jpg
